Name: VRun
About the game: About The addictive VRun runner game for Virtual Reality! This game was inspired by games like Temple Run, Subway Surf, etc. Can you beat the high score?! This game will make you sweat and will pump your heart rate to the roof! During the expedition you got lost from your friends and discovered ancient bridge to the lost city full of treasures. But the bridge is protected by a Monster. Now you have to run for your life to escape the Evil Monster nipping at your heels. Test your reflexes as you race down ancient bridge. Avoid all the obstacles, shoot all the enemys and see how far you can run with monster breathing into your back!! What will be in updates? New monsters New weapons New maps New obstacles Online leaderboard And much more We are looking forward to your comments and suggestions on what do you want to see in this game.
